title: I GOT A LEAVE BUSTER, AND I DID NOT LEAVE!!!
body:
WHY AM I PUNISHED WHEN I DID NOT LEAVE? ANSWER ME THIS, WHY?
HOW CAN I EMAIL DIRECTLY TO LEAGUE OF LEGENDS?
I did get a warning for disconnecting once yesterday, that was because of my wifi. But now today i got a leave buster after a game that i DID NOT LEAVE

replies.body: It looks like you were marked as a leaver in your most recent match with Fiddlesticks.  This was the game that resulted in a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  If you need any more context, feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Player Behavior team will be happy to help.  Hope that helps clear things up!
